sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_train_cert_training_course"> <x_snc_train_cert_training_course action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category/> <cost>0</cost> <course_description>Around the globe companies are relying on data to make optimal decisions and bring about better solutions for their customers.  To stay ahead of the curve and not be left behind you need to develop data literacy - the ability to understand data and guide a data driven analysis process. By the end of this course, you will be prepared to lead a data driven project from start to finish. Data literacy will enable you to stand out among peers as you are able to drive robust data-driven decision making to your organization.</course_description> <course_name>Data Literacy for Business Professionals</course_name> <course_url>https://nowlearning.servicenow.com/lxp/en/data-literacy-for-business-professionals?id=learning_course_prev&course_id=d851bb6fc3930250cfdf34ee0501310d</course_url> <number>COURSE0001002</number> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-09-16 17:46:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>522489f33ba0d2106ca6f66aa5e45a7a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-09-16 17:47:10</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_train_cert_training_course> </record_update>
